resources.string: নিচে আপনার WebsiteLink লিখে See Demo বাটনে ক্লিক করুন।
Enter Website Link & Click See Demo
Description: a simple app to display your website or web application within an Android App

Description: This package is ideal for Scaling your Business Pushing Notification and In-App Messaging within an Android app
